thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com | 3 of 447
thread.title: Ronald Whittle

author: Ronald Whittle
title: Ronald Whittle
text: After applying online, I went into the Conyers dealership. I was not jerked around all day. I picked out the vehicle of my choice and purchased it with no hassle of going back and forth for hours with the salesman and banks. Everyone in the dealership was super nice. We will only deal with Drivetime from now on. I would recommend this place to any and everyone. Thanks Drivetime!!!!
